name: Draughts (NickKaon)
description:
A simple Draughts/Checkers game I put together quickly as practice. 

Based on traditional Draughts rules. Black goes first, and if a piece can capture, a capture move must be made. Player colours are randomised at the start of a game, and your colour appears at the bottom (as if you were sitting at the table playing).

If a piece reaches the opposite end of the board, it is crowned and can move in any diagonal direction.

Use your mouse to select a highlighted piece, then select a square to move the piece. Use right click to cancel selection and choose another piece.

Enjoy :)
